languages.text: "Затем случилось великое счастье — мне наконец разрешили вас предать. И я стал не нужен. Тогда меня отдали в переделку Тервантьясу".
"Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."
languages.original_text: "Затем случилось великое счастье — мне наконец разрешили вас предать. И я стал не нужен. Тогда меня отдали в переделку Тервантьясу".

traits.locale_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed, and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."
"Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed, and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."
"Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."
"Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."
"Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."
"Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

languages.text: 「そして大きな幸せが訪れた。俺はついに裏切りを許された。そして、もはや用なしとなった俺を作り直すために、テルヴァンティアスに引き渡されたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

traits.locale_text: 「そして大きな幸せが訪れた。俺はついに裏切りを許された。そして、もはや用なしとなった俺を作り直すために、テルヴァンティアスに引き渡されたんだ」

languages.text: “后来，至福降临了，他们终于允许我背叛您了。在那之后，他们就不再需要我了，于是把我丢给了特万提亚斯，让他重塑我的身体。”
languages.original_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

traits.locale_text: “后来，至福降临了，他们终于允许我背叛您了。在那之后，他们就不再需要我了，于是把我丢给了特万提亚斯，让他重塑我的身体。”

languages.text: «Entonces sentí una gran felicidad: por fin me permitieron ejecutar la traición. Después de aquello, dejaron de necesitarme, por lo que me entregaron a Tervantias para que me rehiciera».
languages.original_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces sentí una gran felicidad: por fin me permitieron ejecutar la traición. Después de aquello, dejaron de necesitarme, por lo que me entregaron a Tervantias para que me rehiciera».

languages.text: "Dann kam großes Glück. Ich durfte den Verrat endlich begehen. Dann wurde ich nicht mehr gebraucht und sie haben mich an Tervantias geliefert, damit er mich neu macht."
languages.original_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

traits.locale_text: "Dann kam großes Glück. Ich durfte den Verrat endlich begehen. Dann wurde ich nicht mehr gebraucht und sie haben mich an Tervantias geliefert, damit er mich neu macht."

languages.text: « Et le jour béni est arrivé. J'ai enfin reçu l'ordre de vous trahir. Et une fois que je l'ai fait, je ne leur étais plus d'aucune utilité, alors ils m'ont livré à Tervantias pour qu'il me refaçonne. »
languages.original_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

traits.locale_text: « Et le jour béni est arrivé. J'ai enfin reçu l'ordre de vous trahir. Et une fois que je l'ai fait, je ne leur étais plus d'aucune utilité, alors ils m'ont livré à Tervantias pour qu'il me refaçonne. »

languages.text: "Ardından müthiş bir mutluluk geldi. En nihayetinde ihanete girişmeme izin verilmişti. Sonrasındaysa bana ihtiyaçları kalmadı ve baştan yaratılmam için beni Tervantias'a verdiler."
languages.original_text: "Then great happiness came. I was at last allowed to go though with the betrayal. Then I was no longer needed and they delivered me to Tervantias to be remade."

traits.locale_text: "Ardından müthiş bir mutluluk geldi. En nihayetinde ihanete girişmeme izin verilmişti. Sonrasındaysa bana ihtiyaçları kalmadı ve baştan yaratılmam için beni Tervantias'a verdiler."
